item.title: The Collapsing Empire
item.description: Felt more like a soap opera than a space opera at times. There’s a lot of people thinking about, talking about and having sex. There’s a lot of scheming and plotting that sometimes makes sense but often doesn’t. PS: I’m looking to have a good time reading a book so I try to meet the book I’m reading halfway and appreciate what it’s trying to do instead of comment on what I think the author should have done.
